m2mimud.state
Class ItemData

java.lang.Object
  m2mimud.state.ItemData
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
public class ItemData
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable

The ItemData object is the object which stores the information about the items.

See Also:

addWeapon

public void addWeapon(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String desc,
                      int buy,
                      int sell,
                      int bonus,
                      long delay,
                      int type,
                      int theClass)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Adds a weapon to the list of items

Parameters:
id - The id of the item
desc - The description of weapon
buy - The amount of gold needed to buy
sell - The amount of gold acquired by selling the weapon
bonus - The attack bonis assoiated with the weapon
delay - The time (in milliseconds) between swings of this weapon.
type - The type of weaopn (1 hand or 2 hand)
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

              throws java.lang.Exception
Adds a spell to the listing

Parameters:
id - The id of the spell
desc - The description of the spell
buy - The cost of the scroll
sell - The amount earned by selling the scroll
dmg - The damage the scroll does
recast - The amont of time to recast the spell
level - The level needed to use the spell

java.lang.Exception

Parameters:
id - The id of the item
desc - The description of the item
buy - The amount of gold needed to buy the item vv@param sell The amount of gold acquired by selling the item
value - The amount the the potion heals for
which - What this potion heals
